member.name: T:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel
member.summary: A visual control that displays and sets the frequency.
member.remarks: This control is used in the Frequency Display and Waterfall Display plugins to show and control the RX and TX frequencies if the radio. Other plugins may reuse it if they need the frequency display and control functions in their visual interface.

member.name: F:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel.pipeline
member.summary: A reference to the e in the hosting application.
member.remarks: Assign a reference to the to this field before using this control.

member.name: F:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel.bandplan
member.summary: A reference to the band plan object.
member.remarks: Assign a reference to the band plan object to this field before using this control.

member.name: F:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel.PageSizeHz
member.summary: The page size for the Page Up and Page Down command.
member.remarks: The default page size is 10 kHz.

member.name: M:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.FrequencyDisplayPanel.UpdateDisplayedInfo
member.summary: Updates the displayed frequency and split information.
member.remarks: This method reads the dial frequency, split status and split offset from the and updates the displayed information.

member.name: T:VE3NEA.HamCockpit.SharedControls.LedFont
member.summary: Provides a 7-segment LED font.
member.example:
This code assigns the LED font to the Frequencylabel control:
FrequencyLabel.Font = new Font(LedFont.Family, FrequencyLabel.Font.Size);

member.summary: Gets the font family.
